Add a shadow and a shadow_shift column to a dataset

Shift the values and add the shadow

cast_shadow_shift(data, vars)

Arguments

data

data.frame
vars

character string for variables

Value

data.frame with the shadow and shadow_shift vars

Examples


airquality %>% cast_shadow_shift("Ozone")
#> # A tibble: 153 x 3
#>    Ozone Ozone_NA Ozone_shift
#>    <int>   <fctr>       <dbl>
#>  1    41      !NA    41.00000
#>  2    36      !NA    36.00000
#>  3    12      !NA    12.00000
#>  4    18      !NA    18.00000
#>  5    NA       NA   -16.07430
#>  6    28      !NA    28.00000
#>  7    23      !NA    23.00000
#>  8    19      !NA    19.00000
#>  9     8      !NA     8.00000
#> 10    NA       NA   -17.52054
#> # ... with 143 more rows
airquality %>% cast_shadow_shift(c("Ozone", "Temp"))
#> # A tibble: 153 x 6
#>    Ozone  Temp Ozone_NA Temp_NA Ozone_shift Temp_shift
#>    <int> <int>   <fctr>  <fctr>       <dbl>      <int>
#>  1    41    67      !NA     !NA    41.00000         67
#>  2    36    72      !NA     !NA    36.00000         72
#>  3    12    74      !NA     !NA    12.00000         74
#>  4    18    62      !NA     !NA    18.00000         62
#>  5    NA    56       NA     !NA   -18.49479         56
#>  6    28    66      !NA     !NA    28.00000         66
#>  7    23    65      !NA     !NA    23.00000         65
#>  8    19    59      !NA     !NA    19.00000         59
#>  9     8    61      !NA     !NA     8.00000         61
#> 10    NA    69       NA     !NA   -18.62921         69
#> # ... with 143 more rows
